description:
This step-by-step guide covers everything from creating an initial flight plan to finding and adding the correct procedures, and making necessary changes such as adding and removing waypoints. Whether you're new to flight simulation or a seasoned pro, this video will help you master the art of flight planning in MSFS 2024. Don't forget to hit the like button and subscribe for more tutorials! ğŸ›©ï¸ğŸ›«
